name: Resume Review
description:
Come down to the Student Center at 4PM on May 17th, 2021. Women in ICS will be holding a Resume review workshop where the board officers will be showing off sample resumes and providing an opportunity for anyone to get their resume personally reviewed for some constructive feedback!

We will also help build your resume if you do not have one or are in the process of making one! If you have a resume already but youâ€™re looking for ways to stand out in certain industries or just want to find ways to make it better, please stop by as well!

Refreshments will be offered by the club free of charge! Make sure to stop by to improve your resume!

name: Ice Cream Social
description:
Come out and enjoy some ice cream with us, make some new friends, and learn more about what VGDC is all about! All of our board officers will be there.

Available flavors will include:
- Strawberry
- Chocolate
- Vanilla
- Cookies and Cream

Ice cream will be supplied by the club free of charge! This event is scheduled to be around 2 hours.

name: Networking Event
description:
Hack at UCI will be hosting one of our many networking events of the year at Donald Bren Hall at 7PM on May 19th, 2021.

This event will include guest speakers from, but not limited to:
- Facebook
- Apple
- Ingram Micro
- urSpace

This is a great opportunity to meet some industry professionals and fellow students who are interested in the same fields. Make sure to have your linkedIn ready to connect!
